item.title: CliMA/ClimaAtmos.jl
item.description: ClimaAtmos.jl is an atmosphere model that is designed to leverage data assimilation and machine learning tools for modeling and calibrating subgrid-scale processes.

item.title: EnzymeAD/Reactant.jl
item.description: Optimize Julia Functions With MLIR and XLA for High-Performance Execution on CPU, GPU, TPU and more.
